pages.text: By connecting the two differently-sized $(item)cogwheels/$ you can change the gear ratio, either doubling or halfing the $(thing)RPM/$ (rotations per minute).$(p)This speed will affect how fast certain machines will operate, but also their $(thing)stress impact/$.$(p)You can see this $(thing)impact/$ in the machines' tooltips. Running fast requires improved $(l:basics/02_power_generation)powergen/$.

pages.title: Different Cogwheels
pages.text: For example, gearing up three times results in 8x the RPM.
